programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: Edwin van der Sar has faced down pressure on the biggest stages in world football, but his toughest battle came after retirement. In 2023, the legendary goalkeeper suffered a life-threatening brain haemorrhage. In this episode Edwin opens up on his recovery and looks back on his career at the top that redefined goalkeeping. programme.desc: Flamboyant, fearless, and unforgettable - David Luiz lit up the Premier League with his unique style. programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: Tampa Bay stays on the road to play Houston. The Buccaneers held on for a 23-20 win over the rival Falcons in Week 1. Bucs wide receiver Emeka Egbuka caught four passes for 67 yards and two TDs in his NFL debut. The Texans fell 14-9 to the Rams.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Chargers play the Raiders for an early AFC West lead. Justin Herbert tossed a pair of TD passes to Quentin Johnston as Los Angeles took down Kansas City in Brazil. Geno Smith threw for 362 yards in his Las Vegas debut, a 20-13 win in New England.
